name: One-Minute Delivery
description:
One-minute delivery is about delivering packages to houses in under a minute! Forget about all those pesky cameras and precious items- just deliver the package as fast as you can, even if you have to throw it!

This game was submitted to the Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam 2019.

Target Audience

One-minute delivery is for all audiences, particularly those that like first person games, throwing challenges, and time trials.

How To Win

The objective of the game is to deliver as many green packages to each house (indicated by a transparent green box) in under a minute! At the end of the game, you receive a three-star rating depending on the amount of packages you delivered!


TL;DR: Get the package (green box) into the delivery location (green rectangle) as fast as possible.

Game tips

  • Trees and cars may be hiding the delivery zone! Walk around to check each house.
  • Each package has a different address, and it's random each time!
  • Thrown objects travel faster than your walk speed-- throw your packages three houses away if you can!

Controls

  • Keyboard / Mouse
    • Walk: WASD
    • Look: Mouse Move
    • Pick up box/throw box: Left Mouse Button

Cut Features

  • Day/Night cycle
  • Throwing out of a moving truck
  • Randomly spawning houses
  • Driver character
  • Packages delivered counter
  • Different delivery locations (backyard, second floor, etc)

Known Bugs

  • The cursor does not appear in the win screen
  • Standing on top of the packages may cause it to phase through the floor of the truck

Please report any game-breaking bugs you may find on this game's itch.io page.

Team

Enjoy!
